snippet: Rover.com connects dog owners who need temporary care for their animals to dog lovers willing to provide it for some extra cash. On Monday, the company announced that it had raised $3.4 million from the Madrona Venture Group, CrunchFund and various...
abstract: Rover.com connects dog owners who need temporary care for their animals to dog lovers willing to provide it for some extra cash. On Monday, the company announced that it had raised $3.4 million from the Madrona Venture Group, CrunchFund and various angel investors to finance a national expansion.

headline.main: Finding a Sitter for Your Dog, via the Web
